installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
## install required packages to install insurgency: sandstorm
apt update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl unzip libstdc++6 lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
## install steamcmd
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam
cd /mnt/server/steam
## needs to be used for steamcmd to operate correctly
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
## install insurgency: sandstorm
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} +quit
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
chmod +x /mnt/server/Insurgency/Binaries/Linux/InsurgencyServer-Linux-Shipping
